channel.title: The Flames Witnessed at Temperance
channel.description: Recent content on The Flames Witnessed at Temperance

item.description: About # This is a tiny adventure location, designed for 4– 6 characters of levels 1– 2. It is heavily inspired by the dungeon synth album The Sleeping Wizard by Umbría. Concept, writing, title design, and layout by D. D. Gant. Cover art by Joan Llopis Doménech. Edited by Gin Bradbury. Hint: View in fullscreen for ease of use. Press F11 to toggle. History # The isolated islet of Temperance floats a hundred fathoms from the stony shore of the grey sea.
